tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SatelliteImages (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_name VARCHAR(100),
    image_date DATE,
    image_data BYTEA,
    deforestation_area DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE SatelliteImages (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    image_date DATE,
    satellite_name VARCHAR(50),
    deforestation_area DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE DeforestationHistory (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    deforestation_date DATE,
    deforestation_percentage DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES SatelliteImages(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE images (
  image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  image_date DATE,
  image_url VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(satellite_id)
);

CREATE TABLE deforestation_changes (
  change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_id INT,
  change_date DATE,
  change_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DeforestationStatistics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_id INT,
  deforestation_type VARCHAR(50),
  change_log_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES DeforestationAreas(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (change_log_id) REFERENCES ChangeLogs(id)
);
